page.title: 20HEALTH FACILITIES:MK WESTON
page.content: There are no doctors in Market Weston and Barningham but surgeries are held in Hopton, Ixworth & Botesdale.These dispensing Health Centres provide ex- cellent services such as Pre-natal, Well Person & Family Planning clinics plus ample back up facilities. Community nursing plays an invaluable role in this rural situation giving important nursing care in the home. West Suffolk General Hospital is a modern hospital with many facilities serving this area. Transport is supplied to the hospital if patients need it. Mobile units visit Hopton Village Hall car park for chiropody care. There is at present fundraising in progress for an Hospice in Bury St Edmunds which will serve our villages. This contribution to the DOMESDAY PROJECT is by members & friends of Market Weston & District WI.
